beans.description:
Demonstrates an adaptor which reads from stdin and publishes to IBM MQ directly.
Data originates: stdin. Data terminates: MQ.
Run using java org.openadaptor.spring.SpringAdaptor -config mq-writer.xml -props mq.properties
mq.properties is a properties format file which should be edited to supply specific mq property values e.g. channel etc. Alternatively just edit MQSeries_WriteConnector below directly.
You need the following in your classpath
lib lib/openadaptor.jar lib/openadaptor-spring.jar lib/openadaptor-depends.jar mq.jar (this is not distributed with openadaptor)
Once it is running you need to type some data into the command line. To verify that this is working you need to be running the corresponding mq-reader example.

bean.description: This creates the simple pipeline ReadConnector-MQSeries -> WriteConnector.
Configured to write directly to MQ Series.
Set one or other (not both) of useLocalTransactions and useXATransactions to true so as to enable the appropriate transaction mode.
